page.p: I teach Mathematics and Computer Science at Oak Park and River Forest High School in Oak Park, IL.

I have a B.S. in Computer Science/Mathematics from Rhodes College in Memphis, TN., an
M.S. in Mathematics Education from Illinois Institute of Technology, and an
M.S. in Computer Science from University of Illinois in Springfield.

Before becoming a teacher in 2004, I enjoyed a career as a software developer and consultant where I designed and implemented corporate software on platforms ranging from centralized mainframe systems to distributed eCommerce applications.

This site is designed to help my students and their parents get information about classes that I teach. Use the links at the left to get to different information on the site. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions.
